title: Citroen Basalt & Tata Curvv: What are Coupe SUVs, and will they start a new trend in the Indian car market?
description: The arrival of Citroen Basalt and Tata Curvv EV, along with upcoming Tata Curvv ICE, marks a new chapter for coupe SUVs in India. Traditionally limited to luxury brands, these models now target the mass market. The distinctive design aims to differentiate from conventional SUVs, but customer acceptance remains untested.
